verses.name: Psalms 89:6
verses.text: For who in the heaven can be compared unto the Lord? who among the sons of the mighty can be likened unto the Lord?

verses.name: Psalms 89:7
verses.text: God is greatly to be feared in the assembly of the saints, and to be had in reverence of all them that are about him.

verses.name: Psalms 89:8
verses.text: O Lord God of hosts, who is a strong Lord like unto thee? or to thy faithfulness round about thee?

verses.name: Psalms 89:9
verses.text: Thou rulest the raging of the sea: when the waves thereof arise, thou stillest them.
